div.p: Alternative diagrams for Profiling of Manifest. Showing how Minimal is derived from Core DocumentManifest, and Comprehensive is then derived from Minimal.

p.a: • IHE MHD Profile on DocumentManifest for Comprehensive Metadata (SubmissionSet)
• IHE MHD Profile on DocumentManifest for Minimal Metadata (SubmissionSet)

div.p: specification flows down to more specific specification.
specification encompasses the lesser specification with added constraints.
specification is takes the previous specification adds some new constraints to become a bigger specification flowing down
specification in Venn diagram form showing that the inner specifications are a subset of the outer
IHE Folder as a set of Profiles on List Resource

p.a: • IHE MHD Profile on List with Comprehensive Metadata (Folder)
• IHE MHD Profile on List with Minimal Metadata (Folder)

div.p: IHE DocumentReference profiles from FHIR Core DocumentReference

p.a: • IHE MHD Profile on DocumentReference (DocumentEntry) when used in the Provide Transaction with Comprehensive (aka XDS-on-FHIR) Metadata.
• IHE MHD Profile on DocumentReference (DocumentEntry) when used in the Provide Transaction with Minimal Metadata.
• IHE MHD Profile on DocumentReference (DocumentEntry) from a Query with Comprehensive Metadata (aka XDS-on-FHIR).
• IHE MHD Profile on DocumentReference (DocumentEntry) from a Query with Minimal Metadata.

div.p: Provide Document Bundle transaction is a FHIR Bundle with a Manifest, some DocumentReference, some List, some Binary, and maybe one Patient.

p.a: • IHE MHD profile on Provide Document Bundle (ITI-65) transaction with Minimal Metadata

img.alt: Provide Bundle with Minimal metadata requirements Profiles

div.p: The Provide Document Bundle transaction with Comphrehensive metadata must have everything meeting Comphrenensive requirements.

p.a: • IHE MHD profile on Provide Document Bundle (ITI-65) transaction with Comprehensive Metadata

img.alt: Provide Bundle with Comprehensive metadata requirements Profiles

div.p: This is NOT forcing anything except the ITI-65 profile tag, and a DocumentManifest... Trying to debug Bundle transaction profiling.

p.a: • IHE MHD profile on Provide Document Bundle (ITI-65) transaction with Degenerate Metadata

img.alt: Provide Bundle with only Document Manifest requirement Profiles
